content.p: The easiest way to contact us is by raising a query through the Student Enquiry Centre, where you can also access a range of answers to frequently asked questions: Student Enquiry Centre You can also call the team on: +44 (0)115 74 86500 - (Faculty Option; Option 4) 10am - 4pm, Monday to Friday If you have a complex query which youâ€™ve been unable to resolve through the Student Enquiry Centre, you can ask the team for a call-back from the next available experienced advisor. Our next drop-in sessions are at: University Park Central Service Centre, Portland Building, 16th to 27th September 2024 10am to 4pm and 30th September to 4th October, 10am to 1pm
